description: Read the latest bulletins and newsletters for taxi and private hire operators

texts: {"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Consultations"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Central London"}

We want your views on our proposals to make the streets we manage in central London 20mph by 2020 and the associated measures. You have until Wednesday 10 July 2019 to complete our survey and let us know what you think.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"TfL Safer Junctions Programme"}
Our Safer Junctions programme is reducing road danger at some of the most hazardous junctions in London. We're consulting on proposed changes at five junctions. These are:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"https://consultations.tfl.gov.uk/roads/kingsland-road/?cid=kingsland-road\"\u003eKingsland Road/Balls Pond Road\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://consultations.tfl.gov.uk/roads/kennington-park-road/?cid=kennington-park-road\"\u003eKennington Park Road/Braganza Street\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://consultations.tfl.gov.uk/roads/east-india-dock-road/?cid=east-india-dock-road\"\u003eEast India Dock Road/Canton Street/Birchfield Street\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://consultations.tfl.gov.uk/roads/edgware-road-junction/?cid=edgware-road-junction\"\u003eEdgware Road/Harrow Road\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://consultations.tfl.gov.uk/roads/clapham-road-union-road/?cid=clapham-road\"\u003eClapham Road/Union Road\u003c/a\u003e "]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"The Royal Parks Movement Strategy"}

The Royal Parks is developing a movement strategy and have published a discussion paper which sets out their draft aims and principles for the strategy. The discussion paper is available on The Royal Parks' website and you have until Sunday 14 July 2019 to comment on the paper and strategy .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Safe speeds for central London - introducing 20mph speed limits"}

We are consulting on plans to reduce road danger, including proposals to implement a 20mph speed limit on the roads we operate and manage in central London. You have until Wednesday 10 July 2019 to let us know what you think of our proposals.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Kingston Local Plan"}

Kingston Council is inviting views on a range of topics, including transport, to help them develop a new Local Plan. A survey is available on the council's website and you have until Wednesday 31 July 2019 to let Kingston know what you think .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Harrington Square"}
We are consulting on proposed changes around Harrington Square. You have until Friday 28 June 2019 to let us know what you think about the proposals.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Penalty Charges Notices (PCNs) in Barnet"}

Barnet Council is consulting on proposals to increase the charges for the PCNs they issue. You can find details of the current and proposed changes on Barnet's website and have until Wednesday 31 July 2019 to let Barnet know what you think about the proposed changes.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"West Hill area traffic management scheme"}
Wandsworth Council is trialling a new traffic management scheme in the West Hill area. The trial will run for six months. You have until 31 August 2019 to share your views on the trial.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Romford masterplan"}

Havering Council is developing a masterplan for Romford . You can find details of the masterplan on Havering Council's website and have until June 2019 to share your priorities, ideas and aspirations for Romford.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Electric vehicle charging survey for taxi and private hire drivers"}
Zero Carbon Futures is conducting a short survey among taxi and private hire drivers to find out their experiences of charging and requirements for the future. Take the survey .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Holborn Vision and Urban Strategy"}

Camden Council is consulting on a new vision and urban strategy for Holborn. Details of the proposals plus drop-in sessions are available on Camden's website. You have until Wednesday 3 July 2019Â to share your views with Camden on their proposals.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Proposed improvements between Wood Lane and Notting Hill Gate"}

We're consulting on proposals to transform roads in west London through four connected neighbourhood improvement schemes between Wood Lane and Notting Hill Gate. You have until Sunday 16 June 2019 to view our proposals and let us know what you think.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Electric vehicle charging points in Hammersmith"}
Hammersmith and Fulham is inviting requests for locations for new electric vehicle charging points. You have until 1 April 2020 to submit a request .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Other consultations"}
Find out more about other current TfL consultations .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Taxi and Private Hire notices"}
